video.name: Easy Falafel Burger - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Easy Falafel Burger
Full Recipe ➡️ http://www.veganricha.com/2016/08/easy-vegan-falafel-burger.html

Chickpea patties with 5 MINUTE Tahini dressing, tomatoes, onions, pickles make for a filling and flavorful burger. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Ready within 30 Minutes. Can be made gluten-free

Recipes like these in my Book coming this fall. Pre-Order Now -- https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1941252397/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=1941252397&linkCode=as2&tag=vegric-20


#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

Music by Marc Brigantti

recipeIngredient: 30 oz canned chickpeas (washed well and drained. or about 3 cups cooked)
4 cloves of garlic (, preferably roasted or lightly cooked to golden)
1/2 to 1 tsp salt (depends on whether the chickpeas are salted)
1/2 cup more breadcrumbs (use gluten-free crumbs, coarsely blended oats or gf flour to make gluten-free)

itemListElement.text: Drain the chickpeas, wash and drain well and keep ready.
itemListElement.name: Drain the chickpeas, wash and drain well and keep ready.

itemListElement.text: In a processor, add onion, garlic, parsley and cilantro and pulse to mince.
itemListElement.name: In a processor, add onion, garlic, parsley and cilantro and pulse to mince.

itemListElement.text: Add the rest of the ingredients through oil and the chickpeas and pulse to make a coarse mixture.
itemListElement.name: Add the rest of the ingredients through oil and the chickpeas and pulse to make a coarse mixture.

itemListElement.text: Transfer to a bowl and add sesame seeds and breadcrumbs and mix in. Add enough crumbs to make a soft doughy mixture. The dough will become less sticky as it chills.
itemListElement.name: Transfer to a bowl and add sesame seeds and breadcrumbs and mix in. Add enough crumbs to make a soft doughy mixture. The dough will become less sticky as it chills.

itemListElement.text: Chill the mixture for 20 to 30 minutes.Taste and adjust salt, tang, flavor(add more spices if oyu like) and heat and mix in.
itemListElement.name: Chill the mixture for 20 to 30 minutes.Taste and adjust salt, tang, flavor(add more spices if oyu like) and heat and mix in.

itemListElement.text: Shape into patties and pan fry on a heavy bottom skillet over medium heat for 6 to 7 minutes per side.
itemListElement.name: Shape into patties and pan fry on a heavy bottom skillet over medium heat for 6 to 7 minutes per side.

itemListElement.text: Blend everything under tahini dressing. Taste and adjust salt and tang. Add more tahini for thicker dressing and more water for thinner.
itemListElement.name: Blend everything under tahini dressing. Taste and adjust salt and tang. Add more tahini for thicker dressing and more water for thinner.

itemListElement.text: Toast the burger buns. Assemble the burger with sliced tomatoes, onions, lettuce or greens, falafel patties and a generous amount of tahini dressing, pickles. Add some hot sauce if you wish. Serve! I also often add a layer of hummus. Serve as burgers or in a pita bread.
itemListElement.name: Toast the burger buns. Assemble the burger with sliced tomatoes, onions, lettuce or greens, falafel patties and a generous amount of tahini dressing, pickles. Add some hot sauce if you wish. Serve! I also often add a layer of hummus. Serve as burgers or in a pita bread.
